name: Palingenesis
description:
In a world cursed with a spell preventing death, the populous is starving as populations grow. The dwarf sets out on an adventure to break the curse, and restore balance.

Use your corpses and abilities to traverse and solve several puzzles in as few deaths as possible.

------------------------

Controls stated in game

EXPERIMENTAL - yes, this game is very buggy and short, fixes and improvements will come in due time.

Planned additions - texture and music for the boss, Speedrun mode, more levels/worlds, controller support, bug fixes, you get the idea.

----------------------

All music and assets are gathered from OpenGameArt and are CC0 (will upload a file containing attributions in due time, when textures and sounds have been finalised)

Comments/improvements would be appreciated.

(Sorry for no HTML version, I would, but I don't have the correct GMS2 licence)
